articles.title: Hassle-free third-party dependencies
articles.summary: How do you manage your third-party assets? With my simple setup, all I have to do is run one command and reload the page. Lets take a look at managing our third-party dependencies with Bower and preprocessing them…
articles.renderedSummary: How do you manage your third-party assets? With my simple setup, all I have to do is run one command and reload the page. Lets take a look at managing our third-party dependencies with Bower and preprocessing them…
